newsitem.title: USA: Enamelon Inc Q1 net loss widens.
newsitem.headline: Enamelon Inc Q1 net loss widens.

text.p: BALANCE SHEET DATA Three Months Ended 3/31
NOTE: EPS presented for Q3 1996 are on a pro forma basis to give effect to the conversion of the redeemable preferred stock as a result of the Oct 1996 public offering.
The calculations of EPS reflect the conversion of the preferred stock as if it occurred on January 1, 1996.
For accounting purposes, company is still treated as in the development stage. Income from sales of the toothpaste has been reported as a reduction in operating expenses.
